titleStmt.title: A treatise vvherein is manifestlie proued, that reformation and those that sincerely fauor the same, are vnjustly charged to be enemies, vnto hir Maiestie, and the state Written both for the clearing of those that stande in that cause: and the stopping of the sclaunderous mouthes of all the enemies thereof.
titleStmt.author: Penry, John, 1559-1593.

notesStmt.note: By John Penry, whose name appears on [A]2r.
Running title reads: Reformation no enemie to Hir Maiestie and the state.
